original: 吳郡吳縣人，陸遜侄子，歷仕孫吳、西晉。少有聲名，好學有才思。據其自述，作書極多，近百篇，但如今大多已亡佚。
text: A native of Wuxian County, Wu County, nephew of Lu Xun, and a grandson of Wu and Western Jin Dynasty. Little reputation, studious and talented. According to his self-report, he has written a lot of books, nearly a hundred, but most of them have died now.
